content:
Advantages

  • Search Engines

    • No More Searching the Internet - or much more limited crawling and comparing. BIG WIN!
    • Content more up to date, more comprehensive. BIG WIN!

  • Proxies, Caches

    • No polling required, but need to process updates.

  • Users

    • UP TO DATE CURRENT CONTENT. WIN!

  • Content Providers

    • Reduced Load on Servers from Polls from Search Engines, Caches and Users.
    • BIG WIN!!!

  • Developers - Much simpler to build push applications.
